title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information          Â       Welcome to John F. Kennedy National Historic Site!   Essential information for your visit: The site is currently closed and will reopen for the 2016 season on May 21, 2016. Tours are available by appointment only Monday-Friday. To ensure staff availability, please schedule tours two weeks in advance by calling 617-566-7937. During the summer season, programs are offered on a regular schedule.     Operating Hours and Seasons including opening and closing dates. Current schedule of tours and programs Special event information Permits & Reservations, including group information and permits for commercial use including film and photography. Answers to Frequently Asked Questions
